content.prompt: A state government is attempting to reduce the digital divide. Which of the following activities has the greatest potential to contribute to the digital divide rather than reducing it?

choices.label: Providing programs that focus on technology literacy at local libraries
Requiring applicants for government jobs to apply using an online platform
Working with technology companies to offer computing devices at discounted prices to individuals with reduced incomes
Working with telecommunications companies to build network infrastructure in remote areas

skill.text: Skill 5.C: Describe the impact of a computing innovation.
